titles.title: A bill to revise the boundaries of Salem Maritime National Historic Site in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Favorable Executive Comment Received From Interior.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-344.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, OMB.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Department of the Interior. Favorable.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 100-631.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-357.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 686.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 6/10/1987--Introduced. Revises the boundaries of the Salem Maritime National Historic Site, Massachusetts. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands within such boundaries. Limits the acquisition of State or local government lands to donation only.
